root.codeCell: -- Main.graph -- outer block is the main graph block -- each inner block runs async in a coroutine -- define all the apis GO = { path = 'GO'} p = 'GO' Metatable = { __index = function(t, k) local p = t['path'] p = p .. '.' .. k t['path'] = p return GO end, __newindex = function(t, k, v) local p = t['path'] Meta.Apply(p, k, v) end, __call = function(t, val1, val2, val3) local p = t['path'] Meta.Call(p, val1) end } setmetatable(GO, Metatable) do do -- wait for the level selection scene to load Events.WaitForEvent("Scenes.LevelSelection.Loaded") end do -- load the unity asset async Addressables.LoadScene("Assets/Scenes/LevelSelector.unity") end do -- enable the button GO.LevelSelection.Buttons.RetroClouds.Enable() end end
